segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable; it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be cheering him on, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before when the woman wasn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a disaster about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't pull the whole jar down on top of himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the absurdity of this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
